entries.name: Round of ale
entries.properties: Each member of the group (up to 5) receive a pint of ale.

entries.name: Round of wine
entries.properties: Each member of the group (up to 5) receive a glass of wine.

entries.name: Glass of fine wine
entries.properties: Receive a glass of fine wine.

entries.name: Round of food
entries.properties: Each member of the group (up to 5) receive a small meal (tasteless).

entries.name: Meal
entries.properties: Receive a large meal (tasteful).

entries.name: Inn room (poor)
entries.properties: 5 members of a group may sleep in a community room with sackcloth bedding (no benefit to sleep checks).

entries.name: Inn room (common)
entries.properties:
2 members of a group may sleep in a community room with poor bedding.
+3 to a quality of sleep check.

entries.name: Inn room (modest)
entries.properties:
Key to a private tight room with modest bed.
+10 to a quality of sleep check.

entries.name: Inn room (fine)
entries.properties:
Key to a private room with comfortable bed and a lockable chest.
+15 to a quality of sleep check.

entries.name: Inn room (luxury)
entries.properties:
Key to a private large room with a large comfortable bed, a lockable chest, cabinet, and water basin.
+20 to a quality of sleep check.

entries.name: Inn room (grand)
entries.properties:
Key to a private large room with a large comfortable bed, a lockable chest, cabinet, mirror, water basin, and beautiful decorations.
+20 to a quality of sleep check.

entries.name: Traveling by wagon.
entries.properties: Traders often allow travelers to hitch a ride on the way to a trader's destination.

entries.name: Traveling by carriage.
entries.properties: Taxi service to travel upon safe roads.

entries.name: Traveling by ship.
entries.properties: Travel to given destination across a body of water, essentially as ship cargo.

entries.name: Hiring a guide.
entries.properties: Mounted or walking guide through difficult terrain or unknown areas. Ready to resist slight danger.

entries.name: Hiring a mercenary.
entries.properties: Gain a Mercenary companion in the party for each day hired.

entries.name: Examine item
entries.properties: Determines if an item is magical, and has roll of 18 on all hidden properties checks for that item.  Can sometimes determine history of this particular item.

entries.name: Appraise item
entries.properties: Provides appraisal roll of 18 on value of item (note that sell price is rarely value, although buy price should usually be value).

entries.name: Remove disease
entries.properties: Removes any disease on a target.

entries.name: Remove curse bond
entries.properties: Removes any cursed item from target.  This does not remove the curse.

entries.name: Remove curse
entries.properties: Removes any curse on a target.

entries.name: Remove curse from item
entries.properties: Removes any curse on a target item.  This may alter the effects of the item (both good and bad).

entries.name: Make custom armor
entries.properties: Creates a custom armor, fitted to your body: +1 dodge modifier if armor is customized to your body. Cannot make an already forged armor custom.

entries.name: Make superior weapon
entries.properties: Creates a superior weapon: +2 DMG. Cannot make an already forged weapon superior.

entries.name: Make superior armor
entries.properties: Creates a superior armor: +1 armor modifier, +1 dodge modifier. Cannot make an already forged armor superior.

entries.name: Make superior ammunition
entries.properties: Creates a single superior ammunition that adds +2 DMG when fired. Cannot make already created ammunition superior.

entries.name: Make crude weapon
entries.properties: Creates a crude weapon: -2 DMG.

entries.name: Make crude ammunition
entries.properties: Creates a single crude ammunition that adds -2 DMG when fired.

entries.name: Make crude armor
entries.properties: Creates a superior armor: -1 armor modifier, -1 magic resist modifier.

entries.name: Make true strike weapon
entries.properties: Creates a true strike weapon: +5 AR. Cannot make an already forged weapon true strike.

entries.name: Make true strike ammunition
entries.properties: Creates a single superior ammunition that adds +5 AR when fired. Cannot make already created ammunition superior.

entries.name: Make razor sharp melee weapon
entries.properties: Adds razor sharp attribute to a weapon: +1d4 DMG.

entries.name: Make razor sharp ammunition
entries.properties: Adds razor sharp attribute to a single ammunition: +1d4 DMG when fired.

entries.name: Make silver weapon
entries.properties: Creates a silver weapon: ignore weapon resistance and immunity. Cannot make an already forged weapon silver.

entries.name: Make silver ammunition
entries.properties: Creates a single superior ammunition that ignores weapon resistance and immunity when fired. Cannot make already created ammunition superior.

entries.name: Make pure silver weapon
entries.properties: Creates a pure silver weapon: if target has weapon resistance or immunity, instead deal double damage. Cannot make an already forged weapon pure silver.

entries.name: Make pure silver ammunition
entries.properties: Creates a single superior ammunition that if target has weapon resistance or immunity, instead deal double damage when fired. Cannot make already created ammunition superior.
